Bob Potter is responsible for expressor softwareâ€™s business strategy and operating results.

He has spent 27 years in the enterprise software industry serving in senior leadership roles at organizations ranging from venture-backed startups to large public companies.

Prior to expressor software, as CEO of Kalido, Bob established Kalido as the dominant player in adaptive data warehousing and master data management, growing it from $5M to $20M in less than three years.

As EVP of Field Operations of enterprise integration company IONA, he led IONAâ€™s growth to more than $180M in sales and a $2B market cap over a multi-year period.

Earlier in his career, as SVP of Sales and Services at Object Design, he played a pivotal role in taking the company public in 1996. Bob also held senior management positions at ICAD and EDS Unigraphics.

In addition to his role as CEO of expressor software, he also serves on the boards for Tailwind Strategies, Hamilton Thorne Biosciences, and Active Endpoints. He holds a BS degree in Marketing from Providence College and an MBA from the University of Rhode Island.
